<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/authentication"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Provide email and password in order to receive token

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["loginName","password"],"properties":{"loginName":{"type":"string","example":"test@test.com","description":"Email for login"},"password":{"type":"string","example":"pass","description":"Password for login"}},"title":"authentication"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Succesfuly generated token","schema":{"type":"object"}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","schema":{"type":"object"}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
